question: Jason was a pen pal with 13 people. He stopped being penpals with 2 of them. They each send 4 letters a week that are 6 pages long. He responds in kind. He can write a page every 9 minutes. How many hours does he spend writing a week?
answer:
Jason is penpals with 13-2=<<13-2=11>>11 people
Thus he gets 11*4=<<11*4=44>>44 letters a week
So he writes 44*6=<<44*6=264>>264 pages a week
So he writes for 264*9=<<264*9=2376>>2376 minutes a week
So he writes 2376/60=<<2376/60=39>>39 hours a week
#### 39
